title: Admirably sized 1 Bedroom
posting_body: One of Pflugerville's most elegant and exciting luxury apartment communities.
Within easy reach of Central Texas’ finest restaurants, shopping centers and other attractions.
Wonderful apartment in a wonderful community!
If you value excellent living, you'll relish the humongous walk in closet, wash away stress in your private, roomy soaking bath tub, and satisfy your yen for home cooked meals in a great kitchen too.
Relax at the resort-style swimming pools, which is large, well maintained and surrounded by plenty of relaxing seating options.
Or, you can unwind with a round of golf at the private putting green, followed by some exercise in the state-of-the-art gym (which has plenty of cardio and weight lifting equipment).

Add in the upgraded resident clubhouse and several community spaces located throughout the grounds, and you’ll see why residents love the amenities and the opportunity they provide to get to know fellow residents.
Have pets?
You’ll be happy to know that we allow up to two per home
and we welcome a variety of cat and dog breeds.
There are plenty of paths and outdoor spaces for them to enjoy as well.
All this offered at an uncommonly good price!
It won't last!
Ask how to receive a money back rebate of $50-$250 from this locator!
Christena Barry - Award Winning Locator & Realtor
Spirit Real Estate Group
ID:  19
*Prices, availability, & specials subject to change.
*Pics show general property, not necessarily particular unit.
